Can't say I'm really surprised. Banking on non gamers killing time with stupid apps was always a stupid strategy.[/bq]
I think you just summarized why phone gaming was stupid in one sentence.  Sure there's plenty of money in phone gaming, but it's still a video game; the core demographic of people who buy video games is video gamers.  That would be like trying to sell a car to someone that doesn't drive.

topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/533397b56368727c439a0000#post_533397b56368727c439a0000
Joking aside this means that realistically the usa will undergo decades of economic stagnation, military stagnation(can't pay for a large army if you can't pay for it), population stagnation due to record low birth rates and overall stagnation in every way imaginable.

What does this mean for the world?  We're fucked.  Before you say, "hold on the entire world isn't solely the usa" what I mean by this is the nation that is the apex of our current world economy is the usa.  The recession in europe is a domino effect of the usa.  If we go into recession you go into recession as well.  This is going to cause decades of widespread stagnation not only in the usa, but in the world.

Say hello to record low birth rates everyone!  You get record low birth rates!  You get record low birth rates!  Everyone's getting record low birth rates!(The joke here is that every time there's a recession or depression or economic slowdown birth rates sink)

*OH* and that's not even factoring in the deficit; normally we just cheat to get the economy working again.  We cheat by spending fuck tons of money to devalue our money and get the economy working again and then pay of our money that's practically worth as much as paper to get it back to something actually worth a damn and use the economic boom and population boom to cheat.  Well there goes that plan.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53339af46368720adb480000#post_53339af46368720adb480000
Here's the short version:
Blah blah blah technical mumbo jumbo blah blah blah the human race is heading towards a car crash population growth wise due to economic reasons.


Honestly as fucked up as it may seem for me to say this, *BUT* this may actually be a good thing.  We're already heading towards a human mass extinction anyhow due to exponential loss of arable land so having a population crash due to economic reasons before everyone starves to death may be a good thing.


Tl:dr of everything in a nutshell; Blah blah blah the world is fucked and the world's population is going to crash, but that's not necessarily a bad thing considering we're heading towards a mass extinction anyhow.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
